title: 5 Large and Small Cap Cryptos To Spice Up Your Stock Portfolio 2024
content: As markets gear up for a big crypto year, retail investors are wondering about the best cryptos for 2024. This article explores top large and small cap picks for the upcoming year.
Key events, such as a possible Bitcoin ETF approval by January 10 and the Bitcoin Halving in April, may ignite a 2024 bull cycle.
Facing numerous choices for 2024’s best crypto, we offer a variety of large and small cap cryptos with high gain potential.

Starting off our list is Stacks (STX), a layer-2 scaling solution designed for Bitcoin, that enables the development and deployment of smart contracts and dApps within the security of the Bitcoin network.

Poised as one of the most promising Bitcoin beta plays as the markets head into the upcoming halving event in late April, recent months have seen STX rally an impressive +240% over the past 3-months as traders flip bullish in sentiment.

One of the highest growth layer-1s over the past year has been Solana (SOL), which has gained major ground on Ethereum in recent months due to excessive ERC-20 network congestion and high gas fees.

Subsequently burgeoning as the third most active chain in the space, Solana’s native SOL token has emerged as an unmistakably strong hold for the year ahead after posting +255% price gains over the past 3-months.
Coming in at third place is leading decentralized file storage token Filecoin (FIL) which has enjoyed a resurgence over the past month amid an emerging ‘storage narrative’.
Testament to the improved bullish sentiment behind Filecoin is a snapshot of dramatic growth, which has seen FIL price surge an impressive +147% in the past three-months.
With an ongoing retracement offering a tantalizing entry point for new investors, this Chinese-based crypto project isn’t one to be missed.
Rollbit (RLB), a top GambleFi token, claims the second spot. It burst onto the scene in 2023, attracting traders with its significant use-case and revenue share rewards for holders.

Throughout 2023, Rollbit saw aggressive growth, reaching an all-time high of $0.26, a +988% increase for early backers. Currently consolidating after a major pullback, RLB presents an excellent entry point with substantial potential gains for the upcoming year.
